name: OG: Wild Wars
description:
OG is for Old Game. I made this game with GameMaker 6 when I was 11.

Click on the options with the mouse button and defeat the enemy base (the Frowny Fortress)! Go to "Help" in the main menu to master the controls.

Also includes a help doc I made at the time (last modified date is 12/10/2005 at 3:51 PM), "Wild Wars Works.doc"

TitleMechanical MazesEstimated Release DateNovember 23, 2006 Found data that suggests it was actually December 2005My Age at the Time11My Rating Now2/10My Rating Then (Probably)9/10EngineGameMaker 6.0

I dare you to post some of your old games, add the "og" tag, and link to them in the comments below.
